name: Sausage Sliders BETA
description: Sausage Sliders is a game where you are a sausage and you can do stuff (honestly idk what the game is gonna be about) go into the backrooms, attempt to get on top of the barbeque, watch people on the tv, hang out with friends, try to find glitches to annoy me, try to become a dev, a moderator, make mods in MY game, jam to the song I made, Remix it, And More! (maybe)
